mapper.select: select bk.basket_id, bk.liq_id, lq.nm liqNm, bk.qty, lq.liq_img, bk.member_id, co.nm coNm, bk.amount, lq.prc from basket bk, liq lq, liq_co co where bk.liq_id = lq.liq_id and lq.liq_co_id = co.liq_co_id and member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into basket (basket_id, member_id, liq_id, qty, amount) values(basket_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{liqId}, #{qty}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select prc from liq where liq_id = #{liqId}
